name: autodealers-platform
description: Plataforma SaaS multi-tenant para dealers y vendedores de autos

scripts.build:firebase: npm run build:all && echo 'âœ… Todos los builds completados. Ejecuta: firebase deploy --only hosting'
scripts.build:all: npm run build:public && npm run build:admin && npm run build:dealer && npm run build:seller && npm run build:advertiser
scripts.deploy:firebase: npm run build:all && npm run prepare-hosting && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:public: cd apps/public-web && npm run build && cd ../.. && npm run prepare-hosting && firebase deploy --only hosting:public-site
scripts.deploy:admin: cd apps/admin && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting:admin-panel
scripts.deploy:dealer: cd apps/dealer && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting:dealer-dashboard
scripts.deploy:seller: cd apps/seller && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting:seller-dashboard
scripts.deploy:advertiser: cd apps/advertiser && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting:advertiser-dashboard
